# CRON JOB SETUP for every minute parsing

# 1. Open crontab editor:
crontab -e

# 2. Add this line to run every minute:
* * * * * cd /Users/klim/Desktop/сian/app/tg_hamovniki && python parse_cian.py >> parser.log 2>&1

# 3. Alternative: run every 2 minutes (less aggressive)
*/2 * * * * cd /Users/klim/Desktop/сian/app/tg_hamovniki && python parse_cian.py >> parser.log 2>&1

# 4. Alternative: run every 5 minutes
*/5 * * * * cd /Users/klim/Desktop/сian/app/tg_hamovniki && python parse_cian.py >> parser.log 2>&1

# 5. View current cron jobs:
crontab -l

# 6. Remove all cron jobs:
crontab -r
